DOC.brief_summary: This study compare fast-absorbing paracetamol plus caffeine formula placebo over-the-counter dose paracetamol ibuprofen treat episodic tension headache .
DOC.brief_title: Paracetamol With Caffeine Treat Episodic Tension Type Headache
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis episodic tensiontype headache consistent following : 1. number day condition historically great equal two per month 2. onset condition great equal 12 month Visit 1 3. age onset < 50 year 4. severity headache historically least moderate 5. duration headache historically great equal four hour , untreated 6. number headache episode great equal 4 less equal 10 three month immediately prior Visit 1 7. treatment headache episodes OTC analgesic historically provide pain relief less equal 2 hour Subject chronic tension type headache , define headache 15 day per month 3 month . If migraine sufferer , subject average one episode per month , incapable differentiate tensiontype headache migraine headache , and/or require regular prophylactic use migraine medication
